UObject Class Reference

Implements a universal object that can be extended to add functionality. By default this universal object does not have any system functionality. More...

Friends

class UScene

Detailed Description

Implements a universal object that can be extended to add functionality. By default this universal object does not have any system functionality.

Member Function Documentation

Bool UObject::Extend ( ISystemObject *  pSystemObject  ) 

Used to extend the objects functionality for a given system.

Parameters:
pSystemObject A pointer to an already created object.
Returns:
True is successful, false otherwise.

const UObject::SystemObjects & UObject::GetExtensions ( void   ) 

Returns the system objects map for this UObject.

Returns:
A constant reference to the system object mapping.
